text: (upbeat music)
- My name is Sunita Singh,

and I am a software
development manager within AWS.

So in my previous company, I
was working on on-prem cloud.

I was just amazed with
the scale that AWS works,

and that just inspired
me to go pursue that.
It was a daunting leap that I had to take.

My team is part of the
snapshots all within AWS

and we support multiple
public facing services

that our customers use
backup and restore customers.
And we are every day providing simplified,
fulfilling experiences for our customers.

The pace at which we move
and the customer obsession
that we have, it was a day and night shift
from where I'm coming from.

I enjoy the pace because
every day when I come in

and when I leave the day,
it's a fulfilling day.

There is a lot of
interaction and collaboration

that's happening and it's
a very innovative culture,

and all ideas are
welcomed within the team.

So if you're looking for
that type of challenge

and if you're looking for
a more fulfilling career,
come join us.
